description: Create plan folder structure with prd.json and progress.md for tracking product requirements
steps: Verify plans/ folder exists
Verify prd.json contains valid JSON array structure
Verify progress.md file exists
Verify prd.json schema matches: category, description, steps, passes

description: Create data structure and schema for WoW addon exports
steps: Verify data/exports/ folder exists
Verify TypeScript types defined for AddonExport and AddonCategory
Verify details.json exists with valid structure
Verify platynator.json exists with valid structure
Verify JSON validates against TypeScript types
Verify new addons can be added by creating new JSON file

description: Build data loading system to import and validate all export JSON files at build time
steps: Verify utility function loads all JSON files from data/exports/
Verify TypeScript compilation succeeds with type-safe data
Verify addon manifest auto-generated from file structure
Verify manifest lists Details and Platynator

description: Create Hero section component with LucyUI branding
steps: Verify Hero component exists with 'LucyUI' title
Verify subtitle/tagline explains the purpose
Verify minimal, modern styling applied
Verify component renders above main content
Verify responsive design on mobile/tablet/desktop

description: Build core export UI components for displaying and interacting with exports
steps: Verify ExportCard component shows name, description, timestamp, copy button
Verify ExportCard does NOT display export string
Verify AddonTabs component switches between Details and Platynator
Verify SearchBar component filters exports by name/description
Verify CopyButton component exists with visual feedback
Verify all components are keyboard accessible
Verify components are mobile responsive

description: Implement main app layout with hero, search, tabs, and export cards
steps: Verify Hero section displays at top
Verify SearchBar positioned below hero
Verify Addon tabs render correctly
Verify Export cards display in grid layout
Verify filtering works for active tab and search query
Verify empty state shows when no results found
Verify responsive layout on all device sizes

description: Implement copy to clipboard functionality for export strings
steps: Verify clicking copy button copies exportString to clipboard
Verify success notification/toast appears ('Copied!')
Verify works in Chrome, Firefox, and Safari
Verify fallback exists for older browsers
Verify error handling for clipboard permission denials

description: Display relative timestamps for when exports were last updated
steps: Verify lastUpdated date converts to relative format (e.g., '2 days ago')
Verify timestamp displays correctly on export cards
Verify format is readable and user-friendly
Verify handles various timeframes (minutes, hours, days, weeks, months)

description: Apply minimal, modern styling and polish to the entire application
steps: Verify minimal, modern design system using shadcn/ui components
Verify subtle animations for copy feedback and tab transitions
Verify consistent spacing and typography throughout
Verify mobile optimizations applied
Verify accessibility standards met (contrast ratios, focus states)
Verify no WoW fantasy theming present

description: Create documentation for adding and updating exports
steps: Verify README contains 'Adding New Exports' guide
Verify example export JSON structure documented
Verify instructions for updating existing exports
Verify instructions for adding new addon category
Verify can successfully add new export following documentation
Verify can successfully create new addon JSON file following documentation

description: Configure build and deploy process for Vercel static deployment
steps: Verify build.ts bundles all data files correctly
Verify production build succeeds with 'bun run build'
Verify all assets present in dist/ folder
Verify production mode works locally
Verify optimized for Vercel static deployment
Verify successful deployment to Vercel
